vlive.korean: 그런데 홍수치료요법은 사실 굉장히 충격요법 비슷하기 때문에 위험할 수도 있고. But it can be dangerous sometimes. 듣기 View video 10PM : 양재진, 딘딘의 비정상담소 unusual counseling center
vlive.english: But it can be dangerous sometimes.

vlive.korean: 다이어트 식이요법을 안하고... We didn't change our eating habit when were on a diet... 듣기 View video GAVYNJ : GavyNJ_TV
vlive.english: We didn't change our eating habit when were on a diet...

vlive.korean: 식이요법도 있을 테고, 운동도 있겠죠. There could be a diet in nutrition or a diet workout. 듣기 View video V Beauty : Akiba Rie - 리에와 요가Talk_모닝요가로 다이어트해요!

vlive.korean: 저는 식이요법으로 고구마. 그런데 삼시세끼 다 챙겨먹었어요. I ate sweet potatoes. But ate all 3 meals a day. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩의 고민상담소!
vlive.english: I ate sweet potatoes. But ate all 3 meals a day.

vlive.korean: [#살림꾼_민간요법(?)] 그러면 파 물면 눈이 좀 덜 매워요. [#Houskeeper's tip(?)] Bite onto a green onion. It'll help. 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : [FULL] 더 보이즈 '꽃미남 분식집' 2회 '본격오픈준비!' The BOYZ "Flower Snack" ep.2
vlive.english: [#Houskeeper's tip(?)] Bite onto a green onion. It'll help.
